unnormalised: Arrey yaar, RCB aani ek pavtt harli! Distaa team-an 20 over-an fakt 145/8 score kelo. Komse Virat Kohli-n 50 runs marle, vo ardhi century mhunntat titli. Mhaka dube aaasa, ki te kednaa poriant hem durdaiv toddttale. Fuddlem varas, tankam 200+ zai jeetnachi sandhi asunk. *sigh* Sodankal saari, kednaach vordik nhui, kithe?
normalised: arre yaar, R-C-B anink ek pavtim harlya! dista teanchem score fokot ekxim challis panch bhagile aath vis overanim aslem. kam se kam Virat Kohli-n pannaas runs kele, vo ordhi century mhuntat tashem. chintunk poddta te kedna jinx toddtele mhunn. udent vorsak zait, tankam donxim voir zai ashtele ek sandhi mellpak. asterisk sigh asterisk sodanch brides maid, kednach bride nhoi, hanch?
